text: Daniel O'Rourke is a British film producer and businessman. He is best known for starting Not To Scale, a studio that makes films and animation projects. == Early life and education == Daniel O'Rourke was born in England. He went to Whitgift School from 1984 to 1992. After that, he studied film at Sheffield Hallam University and finished his degree in 1995. == Career == In 1996, Daniel started working as a freelance production assistant at M&C; Saatchi in London. In 1997, he briefly worked at Partners BDDH Limited. Then he joined Grey London as a production assistant and later became a junior producer. From 1999 to 2002, he worked as a producer at St Luke's Communications in London. He then worked at Nexus Studios as a producer until 2004. In 2005, Daniel started his own studio called Not To Scale. He still works there as the owner, executive creative director, and executive producer. Daniel also helped start a sound production company called Hear No Evil, where he worked as a partner and advisor from 2007 to 2014. He was also a non-executive director and production advisor at a company called Guided from 2010 to 2012. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Companies Category:Animation studios
title: Daniel O'Rourke
